abstract: Growing number of African immigrants to United States includes large number of women who have undergone genital cutting; influx presents conundrum for many doctors who are not prepared to deal with physical and emotional complications associated with procedure and in some cases may cause further trauma by their reactions; research indicates some half million women in US have experienced genital cutting.
lead_paragraph: As the number of African immigrants in the United States has grown, so too has the number of women living in this country who have undergone genital cutting.

headline.main: Effects of Ancient Custom Present New Challenge to U.S. Doctors
headline.print_headline: Effects of Ancient Custom Present New Challenge to U.S. Doctors
headline.seo: Genital Cutting Cases Seen More as Immigration Rises

snippet: As the number of African immigrants in the United States has grown, so too has the number of women living in this country who have undergone genital cutting.

keywords.value: American Congress of Obstetricians and Gynecologists
keywords.name: organizations
